text_section1.text: Suppose they were to come back... these men of a race now dead a million years! Suppose they were to come back... and say to you, of the twentieth century..
The beginning -- who can say when that was? The man who chipped away at the wall of the pre-historic cave knew his surroundings dated back at least a million years!
How was this man to know of the civilization that vanished and died... though not all of it would remain forever dead!

text_section2.text: A - A slide -- I've started a slide!!

text_section1.text: the man stared in astonishment when he saw what was in the second cave, unsealed by the rock slide...

text_section2.text: It - it can't be! It just can't be!! Those men couldn't get in this cave -- nobody could get into this cave!

text_section1.text: Then he turned to run...

text_section2.text: They're not real! They can't be real!

text_section1.text: Come closer!
Who are you? Speak!

text_section2.text: My name is -- Sawyer... I live in a town near here! I - I was digging for Indian arrowheads!

text_section1.text: Town? Garth, do you realize what this means? We slept long enough for a new civilization to arise!

text_section2.text: I know -- I caught a glimpse of it through his mind. Great cities, roads -- all that our own world had and more!

text_section1.text: Except that I was able to control his mind! Man is no longer as we knew him! Who knows what use we may make of that?

text_section2.text: Aye... who knows? If we can control his mind -- we can control others -- who knows?

text_section1.text: After that, Sawyer answered questions and then, he listened. But what he heard was too much for his poor, hurt mind...

text_section2.text: Y-You're going to take over the world? But -- you can't!

text_section3.text: Fool! Who can stop us? Even in out own time, we planned to sieze power -- but nature forestalled us!

text_section1.text: Sawyer could see it as the words beat at him. A mighty civilization -- vanishing! And two men desperate for life...

text_section2.text: In here! Our only chance is to seal ourselves away from the meteorites and the gases they generate!

text_section3.text: Y-You mean to put ourselves in a cataleptic trance?

text_section1.text: Sawyer could see, but not understand...

text_section2.text: We had that power! -- We blanked out our minds... we slept and waited! Now through you, we shall still rule!

text_section3.text: You will bring us food ... information! And when we are ready -- your world will be ours!

text_section1.text: Sawyer shook his head weakly. But his brain was gripped in an iron vise! From that moment on, he obeyed...

text_section2.text: Our friends has been most helpful! Food, books, information -- we owe him much!

text_section3.text: This must be our main target, their capitol! We must control those who control the government...

text_section1.text: Now he can lead us to his town. We'll take over the minds of those who live there! We need followers... an army!

text_section2.text: An army of slaves, obeying without question! Perhaps it is just as well that we waited for this world!

text_section1.text: And so, the last act began...
Now! Strike!! Let them feel our power!
Mental energy lashed out! But this was not how it was to have been! This was all wrong...

text_section2.text: All right you two -- what goes on here? Where's the masquerade? What's this all about?

text_section3.text: Garth! They - they resist us! We can't control them -- we can't control their minds!

text_section1.text: Control our minds? Say, what are you -- hypnotists? There's something strange about you two! You'd better come with me!

text_section2.text: No! You - you barbarian! Down on your knees -- I command you!

text_section1.text: I command you! You cannot resist! Down!!

text_section2.text: They're crazy as coots! Probably escaped from some asylum! Grab 'em!

text_section1.text: Okay! Now, talk! Who are you? Talk!

text_section2.text: W-we controlled that man's mind -- but we could not control yours! He led us astray -- but how? How was it that we controlled him?

text_section1.text: You just made a bad choice! Sure you could control Sawyer... anyone could! He suffered an injury to his brain! Now, the poor guy is like a child -- he'll do anything people ask him to!
